channel.title: Azure on Fleming Systems LLC
channel.description: Recent content in Azure on Fleming Systems LLC

item.title: Azure App Service, Web Apps, and Containers
item.description: Today my goal was to use docker + Azure to get a web app deployed to Microsoft Azure’s web apps. After about 2 hours and some reading I was able to get through it! It should also be noted that before today I have briefly messed with Docker containers in the past but hadn’t quite understood the power of containers. I’m happy to report that I have become a fan!
